Test Case Description: Verify that all top navigation menu items are visible and clickable
Expected Result: All menu items are displayed and redirect to correct subpages

Test Steps: 2. Verify presence of menu items like "Your Industry", "Our Services", "Customer Centre"
3. Click each item and confirm redirection

Test Case Description: Verify breadcrumb trail on inner pages
Expected Result: Breadcrumb like "Home > Our Services > Intermodal" is shown

Test Steps: 2. Check if breadcrumb is present and shows correct path

Test Case Description: Verify website complies with accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1)
Expected Result: Website is fully accessible per WCAG 2.1 Level AA

Test Steps: 2. Use screen reader (e.g., NVDA or VoiceOver)
4. Check alt text for images and semantic HTML structure

Test Case Description: Verify Carbon Calculator tool functions correctly
Expected Result: Emissions estimate is returned based on input

Test Case Description: Verify “Contact Us” form submission works properly
Expected Result: Form is submitted and confirmation is shown
